text: I'm at Somerset clinic and Dr. Penny is my favorite doctor. She helped me to do Plinest and Profhilo treatment.  The treatment is very effective.  My skin is glow and radiant. The staffs are super friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

The staff are very accomodating especially Winnie (she explains, listens and understands your situation)! They offer drinks and goodies while waiting for your turn to do the treatment. Budget wise, they are willing to adjust for you with special promotion on top of it. This clinic branch is clean with good lighting. The doctor is calm and accomodating that make you feel safe every procedure. Thank you everyone!

I recently visited V Aesthetic Somerset 111 outlet for a Dual Laser, Pico, and Sylfirm treatment. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the professionalism and kindness of the staff, particularly Mandy and Dr. Penny.
